title: How to Make a Lot of Money in Stick RPG at Stickpage

steps.title: First, go to xgenstudios.com and then Stick RPG *C* on the side to start playing!
steps.content: First, go to xgenstudios.com and then Stick RPG *C* on the side to start playing!

steps.title: Get your intelligence up to twenty by going to the University of Stick and clicking "study".
steps.content: Get your intelligence up to twenty by going to the University of Stick and clicking "study". While you are doing this, apply for a job at New Lines Incorporated to get money.

steps.title: When you get up to $10, go to the Convenience store and buy a smoke.
steps.content: When you get up to $10, go to the Convenience store and buy a smoke. then, go up to that light blue guy that is between your house and the bank, click on him, then click "give smokes". He should give you a skateboard in return, and more Charm points, but reduce your Karma. Now, while you are walking, you can press shift to skateboard there, making it faster to go places.

steps.title: Drink beer.
steps.content: Drink beer. Another way to gain Charms points is by drinking some beer, which would give you two Charm points. But, wait! There is yet another way: go to the orange dude that is by the bar, click on him, and click on "give 10 dollars". This will also increase your Karma.

steps.title: While you are trying to gain your intelligence, you can always work out, too, at the same yellow place you go to study.
steps.content: While you are trying to gain your intelligence, you can always work out, too, at the same yellow place you go to study.

steps.title: After you have gained 20 intelligence or more, go back to New Lines Incorporated, click on "Apply for a Promotion" and voila, you now have a job that pays higher.
steps.content: After you have gained 20 intelligence or more, go back to New Lines Incorporated, click on "Apply for a Promotion" and voila, you now have a job that pays higher.

steps.title: Continue increasing your intelligence through studying at the University, and save up for the second house upgrade.
steps.content: Continue increasing your intelligence through studying at the University, and save up for the second house upgrade. This will allow you to buy a computer, which will give access to the stock market! The stock market is what allows players to gain hundreds of millions of dollars (but it requires a bit of luck).

steps.title: Once you have access to the stock market, wait until a stock goes down to $1.
steps.content: Once you have access to the stock market, wait until a stock goes down to $1. Invest everything you have into it and watch it grow! You can't lose money here because stocks can't go lower than $1!

steps.title: A better way to get money however is to work at the clinic.
steps.content: A better way to get money however is to work at the clinic. If you max out in that, you get around $418 in salary, which gives you a better chance at buying the Cozy Condo, and then the Penthouse.
